title: Instructional Design Development Education Through Collaborative Classroom Organization

context.prior_knowledge: Subject matter expertise in science and understanding of basic instructional design theories
context.additional_context: Learners (pre-service teachers or in-service teachers with <3 years of experience) practice project-based collaborative science lesson design, developing instructional design competencies through interactive processes

learning_goals: Apply an interactive instructional design process in collaborative learning environments to develop three or more PBL science curriculum materials
Identify five core elements for improving instructional design by establishing a feedback routine with peer teachers
Design and operate a collaborative learning environment using digital tools in a BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) setting, measuring three indicators of instructional effectiveness

resources: Digital Collaboration Tools (Google Workspace, Miro, etc.)
Instructional design templates and assessment rubrics
Exemplary lesson videos for case analysis

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
